intro.title: Hi, I am Thomas
intro.content: Hey, I am a senior front-end developer and consultant with a passion for art, code, and strategy! I help clients not only with front-end challenges but also with developing a robust digital vision.

content.title: Front-end Development
content.content: Since 2012, I have been working as a front-end developer. I enjoy creating user-friendly and scalable UIs and websites.

content.title: Front-end Engineering
content.content: I enhance UX and performance by applying the latest technologies and frameworks. Typescript is an essential part of my workflow.

content.title: JavaScript and TypeScript Specialist
content.content: With extensive experience in JavaScript and TypeScript, I love working with tools like React, Next.js, Three.js, and advanced tooling for complex projects.

content.title: Digital Consultancy
content.content: I collaborate with businesses and startups to improve strategy, UX, accessibility, and architecture.

content.title: What is next?
content.content: I continuously experiment and expand my knowledge. Currently, I am focusing on AI integration, Web3 solutions, and enterprise-level development.
